citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:46 PM on 17-
September-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door of the facility and calling the
contact number on file. Contact was made with the licensee and he was unavailable for inspection. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:46 PM on 17-
September-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door of the facility and calling the 
contact number on file. Contact was made with the licensee and he was unavailable for inspection. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
